profile.description: Software developer with over 10 years of experience in full-stack development, skilled in Node.js, AWS, and React. Strong focus on delivering scalable solutions and implementing modern development practices.

experience.title: NodeJS Developer
achievements: Developed scalable backend solutions for AttorneyShare using Node.js, TypeScript, and AWS
Implemented robust API endpoints and services
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Led development on Ristrak using Java, Spring Framework, and Angular
Built GRS Surety Admin Offices with Node.js, React, and AWS Lambda
Developed GRS Surety KYC screening application using modern tech stack
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing workflows

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed Sydney Health mobile telehealth app using React Native
Built Hoddie cannabis industry analytics PWA with AWS Lambda and GraphQL
Created content creator platform using Next.js and AWS services

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed HubNext using Drupal, Symfony, and modern PHP practices
Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Maintained high code quality through unit testing and code reviews

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology - BTech, Computer Software Engineering

projects.title: AttorneyShare

projects.title: Unused Dependencies Analyzer
projects.description: Created an NPM package that analyzes and identifies unused dependencies in Node.js projects, helping developers maintain clean and efficient codebases. Features interactive CLI and detailed package analysis.
